articles.author: JUAN A. LOZANO and MICHAEL GRACZYK Associated Press
articles.title: Texas inmate faces execution for killing wife in 2005
articles.description: A Texas inmate with a history of violence against women faces execution for fatally shooting his wife, who had feared she would never get out of her marriage alive
articles.content:
HOUSTON -- 
A Texas inmate with a history of violence against women is set to be executed Wednesday evening for fatally shooting his wife, who had feared she would never get out of her marriage alive.

articles.title: 5 takeaways from the last Democratic debate before the Iowa caucuses
articles.description: Six Democrats clashed on the smallest debate stage yet in Iowa, only 20 days before caucusgoers across the Hawkeye state are set to cast the first votes of the primary.

articles.title: AP Explains: US sending asylum seekers to Central America
articles.description: The U.S. government plans to begin sending Mexican asylum seekers to Guatemala and has finalized steps with Honduras to begin sending asylum seekers from other countries there
articles.content:
MEXICO CITY --

articles.title: 4h person pleads guilty in $1B California energy scam
articles.description: An executive of a San Francisco Bay Area solar energy company has pleaded guilty to participating in what federal prosecutors said was a massive Ponzi scheme scheme that defrauded investors of $1 billion
articles.content:
SACRAMENTO, Calif. -- 
An executive of a San Francisco Bay Area solar energy company pleaded guilty Tuesday to participating in what federal prosecutors said was a massive Ponzi scheme scheme that defrauded investors of $1 billion.

articles.title: Marine sentenced to 3 years for illegal firearms
articles.description: A Marine stationed in Hawaii has pleaded guilty to possessing unlawful firearms. Ali Al-kazahg was accused of trying to bring weapons onto an Air Force base while home in Nebraska
